title: Finalize and complete mainnet deployment guide for Micro Tools Hub

requirements.text: Complete the existing deployment guide at frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md so it contains a full, runnable set of steps to deploy the app to the Internet Computer mainnet (live), including build/deploy commands, environment/network selection, and a short post-deploy verification checklist.
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md is no longer truncated and renders as valid Markdown (no dangling/open code fences).
The guide includes explicit commands/steps for: installing prerequisites, building the frontend, deploying canisters with dfx to mainnet, and how to select the mainnet network.

The guide includes a post-deploy verification checklist covering at least: app loads in browser, each tool page is accessible from the hub, QR/password/name/unit/image tools function in the deployed build, and AdSense script is present in the delivered HTML.

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor (all backend logic in backend/main.mo).
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or other frontend immutablePaths; compose those components instead.
Use English for any user-facing text.
nonGoals: Adding new tools or expanding existing toolsâ€™ functionality.
Changing the Google AdSense loader snippet in frontend/index.html.
Implementing third-party authentication beyond Internet Identity.
